articles.title: Emma Raducanu's Big Tennis Comeback
articles.summary: Emma Raducanu, a British tennis player, has reached her first final since winning the US Open in 2021. She played a tough match against Oleksandra Oliynykova and won in three sets. Raducanu became famous when she won the US Open as a young qualifier, but she has faced many injuries and coaching changes since then. This win is special because it shows she is fighting hard again. She will now play Sorana Cirstea in the final. Another British player, Katie Boulter, also made a final on the same day, making it a great day for British women's tennis. Raducanu thanked the crowd in Romania, where her father is from, for their support.

articles.title: Lola Young's Comeback Show After Health Scare
articles.summary: Lola Young is a famous singer who won a Grammy award. Last year, she collapsed on stage during a music festival, which worried her fans. She had to cancel her big tour to rest and get better. Now, she is feeling okay and has announced a special comeback show at the London Palladium on March 4th. This show is smaller and more intimate, so not all fans who had tickets before can come. She hopes to do bigger shows later. Tickets will go on sale soon, with a limit of two per person. Lola is excited to perform again and thank her fans for their support.

articles.title: A Royal Friend and a Money Man
articles.summary: This article talks about emails that show Prince Andrew, a member of the British royal family, had a close friend named David Rowland who helped him with money. Prince Andrew called Rowland his 'trusted money man' in messages to Jeffrey Epstein, a businessman who got into trouble. The emails suggest Prince Andrew tried to get Epstein to invest in Rowland's business projects. Rowland was a rich donor to a political party, but some people in the UK called him a 'shady financier,' which means they thought he might not be honest. Epstein did not want to work with Rowland after hearing this. The emails also mention that Rowland might have lent money to Prince Andrew's ex-wife, Sarah Ferguson, for things like a first-class flight to Nepal. Regulators have taken away the banking license from Rowland's bank, Banque Havilland, because of problems. The article says there are many questions about Prince Andrew's money and his friendship with Rowland, but not all claims are proven.

articles.title: Taylor Swift's Fun New Video with Graham Norton
articles.summary: Taylor Swift made a new music video for her song Opalite, and it has some famous people in it! Graham Norton, who is a funny TV host, and Lewis Capaldi, a singer, both star in the video. The video is set in the 1980s and is very silly. It shows an actor named Domhnall Gleeson who uses a magic potion on his cactus to bring Taylor Swift into his life. Graham Norton plays a salesman who says he can undo the magic. The idea for the video came from a joke on Graham Norton's TV show last year, where Domhnall said he wanted to be in a Taylor Swift video. Taylor Swift thought it was a great idea and wrote a script for everyone from that show to be in the video. The video premiered on Friday, and it's part of Taylor's big album called The Life Of A Showgirl.

articles.title: A Smart Trick to Make Quantum Computers Work Better
articles.summary: Quantum computers are super-fast machines that could help solve big problems, but they make mistakes easily. These mistakes are called errors, like when a qubit (the basic part of a quantum computer) flips from 0 to 1 or changes its phase. To fix this, scientists combine many qubits into one logical qubit and use error correction to keep information safe. A team led by Professor Andreas Wallraff found a new way to do calculations on these logical qubits while fixing errors at the same time. This is important because it helps quantum computers run without being stopped by mistakes. They used a method called surface codes, where information is spread across many qubits and checked with stabilizers to find and correct errors. This brings us closer to practical quantum computers that can do amazing things.

articles.title: Zayn Malik's New Music and Tour
articles.summary: Zayn Malik, a singer from the band One Direction, has announced a new album called Konnakol and a world tour. He released a song called Die For Me, which is about asking someone to stay. The album title Konnakol means making drum sounds with your voice, a style from South Indian music. Zayn has used South Asian influences before, like singing in Urdu. Fans are excited to hear the new music and see him on tour. Other former One Direction singers like Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson are also releasing music, and Niall Horan has a new song too.
